Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to authorizing the city of Lockport to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy
Summary: Authorizes the city of Lockport to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing the city of Lockport to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy
